article_title: Don't Eliminate The One Health Agency Aimed At Fixing Our Broken System

article_metadata.author: Bill Frist

og.description: By Bill Frist | The Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ) is under attack. The House Budget Committee eliminated funding for AHRQ in June, effectively killing the agency by redirecting its budget to the National Institutes of Health. While this funding change has not been approved by the full Congress, it sets the agency up for significant cuts in the final fiscal 2017 appropriations legislation as we approach the end of the budget year.
